io.micronaut.http.client.netty

Class RxNettyHttpClientRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.http.client.netty.RxNettyHttpClientRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RxHttpClientRegistry, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    @Factory
 @Internal
public class RxNettyHttpClientRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable, RxHttpClientRegistry
    Factory for the default implementation of the HttpClient interface based on Netty.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
